ref.mixed-citation: Niang, I., Ruppel, O. C., Abdrabo, M., Essel, A., Lennard, C., Padgham, J., et al. (2014). ‘‘Africa’’ In Climate Change 2014: Impacts, adaptation, and vulnerability.
